3 - Both") pb))
(if pb (cond ((equal? pb "1") (set! mc (string-append "
\pageBreak
" mc))) ((equal? pb "2") (set! mc (string-append mc "
\pageBreak

\pageBreak
" mc "\pageBreak
")))))
(if (string-null? title) (begin (d-DirectiveDelete-paper tag) (d-DirectiveDelete-movementcontrol tag)) (begin (d-DirectivePut-paper-postfix tag (string-append "

row._tooltip: Gives a heading for a table of contents, inserting the table in the book.
